FIELD.NAME: CMD-SOURCE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Which user/workposition/proc/schedule the message originated from

FIELD.NAME: CMD-FORMAT
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Type of command (CCSDSPACKET, CCSDSFRAME, CLTU, MNEMONIC, RAW, TDM)

FIELD.NAME: BYPASS
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: CCSDS COP-1 flag for “Bypass of Acceptance Check”, i.e. without verification

FIELD.NAME: FRAME-COUNTER
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Reset to next expected command counter

FIELD.NAME: CMD-TYPE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: If REALTIME, execute upon receipt. If FUTURE, execute at SPACECRAFT-EXECTION-TIME. (REALTIME and FUTURE are the two values allowed.)

FIELD.NAME: RELEASE-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Time the command should begin being released from the front end processor to the remote tracking station.

FIELD.NAME: EARLIEST-UPLINK-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Absolute or relative time can apply.

FIELD.NAME: LATEST-UPLINK-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Absolute or relative time can apply.

FIELD.NAME: SPACECRAFT-EXECUTION-TIME
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Required if CMD-TYPE = ‘FUTURE”. Absolute or relative time can apply.

FIELD.NAME: RESPONSE
FIELD.DESCRIPTION: Indicates if a response is required. Defaults to No.
